md:
giải nghĩa từ "seasonal" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Seasonal (adjective)
	+ Meaning: Happening or done at a particular time of year.
	+ Vietnamese: Theo mùa, theo thời vụ.
	+ Example sentence: The seasonal flowers are blooming in the garden.
	+ Related words: seasonal worker, seasonal job, seasonal fruit.
	+ Antonyms: year-round, permanent.

* Seasonal (noun)
	+ Meaning: A person who works only during a particular season.
	+ Vietnamese: Người lao động theo mùa.
	+ Example sentence: Many seasonal workers are needed to harvest the crops.
	+ Related words: seasonal employment, seasonal staff.
	+ Antonyms: full-time worker, permanent employee.

Note: The word "seasonal" can have different meanings depending on the context. In the first definition, it refers to something that happens or is done at a particular time of year. In the second definition, it refers to a person who works only during a particular season.
